How to get date columns in pandas?

I need a separate date column(in this format2018-10-08) in this table. please help. id id2 post id level created_at 0 150 126293 BA 237602 0 2018-10-08 15:37:06.404741 1 150 126293 BA 217350 0 2018-09-26 11:27:20.610651 2 4655 169068 BA 172174 1 2018-08-07 15:54:15.961607 3 14058 201462 BA 231703 1 2018-10-04 18:26:06.915134 4 16576 241053 agent 416451 2 2019-02-06 16:59:41.550580 5 16576 241053 agent 423247 2 2019-02-10 18:10:12.987203 6 16700 102938 BA 476606 0 2019-03-07 23:23:36.902590 7 50374 131808 TSM 203392 0 2018-09-13 21:54:45.874108 8 50374 131808 TSM 103873 0 2018-03-23 17:30:20.647447
